SLIDE1.TITLE: Professional Haircut
SLIDE1.DESCRIPTION: Get a modern and personalized style.

SLIDE2.TITLE: High-quality Products
SLIDE2.DESCRIPTION: We offer premium products for hair and beard care.

SLIDE3.TITLE: Exceptional Services
SLIDE3.DESCRIPTION: Expert barbers for a flawless look.

EXPERIENCE.TITLE: Our Experience
EXPERIENCE.DESCRIPTION: With over 4 years of providing professional barber services, we guarantee exceptional care for your hair and beard. Our skilled barbers are dedicated to delivering personalized styles and ensuring that every visit leaves you looking and feeling your best. We take pride in using high-quality products and staying updated with the latest trends to meet all your grooming needs.

GALLERY.MEDIA_DESCRIPTION_1: Experience the art of grooming with our professional barbers, ensuring a precise and stylish look every time.
GALLERY.MEDIA_DESCRIPTION_2: Our premium beard care services leave your beard feeling soft, healthy, and perfectly groomed.
GALLERY.MEDIA_DESCRIPTION_3: We combine tradition and modern techniques to deliver the perfect haircut that suits your personality.

SERVICES.TITLE: Our Services
SERVICES.GENERAL_CUT_DESC: The perfect cut for your eyebrows, precise and styled.
SERVICES.BLADE_SHADE_DESC: Blade shading to enhance and define your eyebrows.
SERVICES.BEARD_TRIM_DESC: Keep your beard well-shaped with a precise trim.
SERVICES.FACIAL_CLEANSE_DESC: Deep cleansing that revitalizes your face.
SERVICES.TRIBAL_DESIGN_DESC: Unique, modern designs to express your style.
SERVICES.BEARD_SHADE_DESC: Give your beard a soft, even shading.
SERVICES.BLACK_MASK_DESC: Intense cleansing with our black mask to remove impurities.
SERVICES.HAIR_DYE_DESC: Vibrant, long-lasting colors for your hair.
SERVICES.HIGHLIGHTS_DESC: Add light and depth to your hair with highlights.

PRODUCT1.TITLE: Molding Wax
PRODUCT1.DESCRIPTION: Provides ultimate hold and volume, while smoothing and giving shine to the hair.

PRODUCT2.TITLE: OSSION Wax
PRODUCT2.DESCRIPTION: Gives your hair shine and strength.

PRODUCT3.TITLE: OSSION Wax
PRODUCT3.DESCRIPTION: Gives your hair shine and strength.

FEEDBACK.PLACEHOLDER: Write your comments, suggestions, or recommendations...

HISTORY.TITLE: History of the Barber Shop
HISTORY.DESCRIPTION: CHEVALIER was born from the dissatisfaction of its founder after receiving poor service in a barbershop. He decided to open his own barbershop, with the goal of offering exceptional and personalized service to all clients.

MISSION.TITLE: Mission
MISSION.DESCRIPTION: To create and provide professionals, services, and high-quality products focused on haircuts, barbering, and image consulting for men, in an exclusive, pleasant, safe, and calm space.

VISION.TITLE: Vision
VISION.DESCRIPTION: To be the leading and most important barbershop in Ecuador within the next 10 years, relying on the innovation and creativity of our team in creating styles, trends, and experiences for the utmost satisfaction of our clients.

VALUES.TITLE: Our Values
VALUES.DESCRIPTION: At CHEVALIER, we value the quality of our service, attention to detail, and customer satisfaction. Our team is committed to making every visit an unforgettable experience.

EXPERIENCE.TITLE: Customer Experience
EXPERIENCE.DESCRIPTION: When you enter CHEVALIER, you are welcomed into a cozy, elegant, and exclusive environment. From the moment you arrive, you will feel attended to by professionals who care about your style and well-being.

CONTACT.TITLE: Contact Information
CONTACT.SOCIAL_MEDIA: Follow us on Facebook, Instagram, and TikTok.

PRIVACY_POLICY.TITLE: Privacy Policy
PRIVACY_POLICY.INTRO: At Chevalier Barber Shop, we respect and value the privacy of our users. This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use, and protect the personal information you provide through our website.

SECTION_1.TITLE: 1. Information We Collect
SECTION_1.CONTENT: When you visit our website, we may collect the following information: Personal data: Name, email, phone number, address or other information you provide when contacting us or booking a service. Browsing data: Information about your visit, such as your IP address, browser type, and pages visited.

SECTION_2.TITLE: 2. Use of Information
SECTION_2.CONTENT: The information we collect is used for the following purposes: Providing and improving our services. Managing bookings and inquiries. Sending updates, promotions, and news related to Chevalier Barber Shop. Improving the user experience on our website.

SECTION_3.TITLE: 3. Sharing Information
SECTION_3.CONTENT: We do not share your personal information with third parties, except in the following cases: When necessary to comply with the law. If required to process payments or reservations.

SECTION_4.TITLE: 4. Security
SECTION_4.CONTENT: We are committed to protecting your personal information. We use appropriate security measures to prevent unauthorized access and disclosure of your information.

SECTION_5.TITLE: 5. User Rights
SECTION_5.CONTENT: You have the right to access, correct or delete your personal information. To exercise these rights, you can contact us at chevalierbarbershop13@gmail.com.

SECTION_6.TITLE: 6. Cookies
SECTION_6.CONTENT: Our website uses cookies to enhance the user experience. You can disable cookies in your browser settings.

SECTION_7.TITLE: 7. Changes to the Privacy Policy
SECTION_7.CONTENT: We reserve the right to modify this Privacy Policy at any time. Changes will be posted on this page.

SECTION_8.TITLE: 8. Contact
SECTION_8.CONTENT: If you have questions about our Privacy Policy, you can contact us at chevalierbarbershop13@gmail.com.

SECTION_9.TITLE: 9. Integration with Facebook
SECTION_9.CONTENT: If you use our services through Facebook, we may receive information such as your name and email address. This information is used solely for the purposes described above. Facebook Privacy Policy: https://www.facebook.com/policy.php

TERMS.TITLE: Terms of Service
TERMS.SECTION_1_DESCRIPTION: By accessing and using the Chevalier Barber Shop website, you agree to abide by these Terms of Service and any applicable laws. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our services.
TERMS.SECTION_2_DESCRIPTION: Chevalier Barber Shop offers barber services and products for sale. We reserve the right to modify or discontinue our services at any time without prior notice.
TERMS.SECTION_3_DESCRIPTION: Reservations for services can be made through our website or by direct contact. We reserve the right to reject or cancel a reservation due to limited availability or under special circumstances. If you wish to cancel a reservation, you must do so at least 3 hours in advance.
TERMS.SECTION_4_DESCRIPTION: The prices of services and products offered are indicated on the website and are subject to change without prior notice. Payments must be made at the end of the service or when purchasing products, through accepted payment methods in our establishment or website.
TERMS.SECTION_5_DESCRIPTION: All content on this website, including texts, images, graphics, logos, and other materials, is the property of Chevalier Barber Shop or its licensors and is protected by intellectual property laws. Its use is not permitted without the prior written consent of Chevalier Barber Shop.
TERMS.SECTION_6_DESCRIPTION: Chevalier Barber Shop will not be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from the use of our services or the website. We reserve the right to update, modify, or delete any information on the website without prior notice.
TERMS.SECTION_7_DESCRIPTION: This website may contain links to third-party websites. We are not responsible for the content or practices of these external sites.
TERMS.SECTION_8_DESCRIPTION: We reserve the right to modify these Terms of Service at any time. Changes will be posted on this page and will take effect immediately upon publication.
TERMS.SECTION_9_DESCRIPTION: These Terms of Service are governed by the laws of Ecuador. Any disputes related to the use of our services or website will be resolved in the courts of that jurisdiction.
TERMS.SECTION_10_DESCRIPTION: If you have any questions or concerns about these Terms of Service, you can contact us at chevalierbarbershop13@gmail.com.

DATA_DELETION.TITLE: Data Deletion Instructions
DATA_DELETION.INTRO: At Chevalier Barber Shop, we value your privacy and offer you the option to delete the personal data you have shared with us. If you wish to request the deletion of your data, please follow the steps below:
DATA_DELETION.REQUEST_DESC: To request the deletion of your personal data, send an email to chevalierbarbershop13@gmail.com with the following information:
DATA_DELETION.REQUEST_EMAIL: The email address associated with your account or booking.
DATA_DELETION.REQUEST_DESCRIPTION: A description of the data you wish to delete (e.g., contact information, booking history, etc.).
DATA_DELETION.PROCESS_DESC: Once we receive your request, we will process the deletion of your data within 30 days. We will notify you once the process is complete.
DATA_DELETION.CONSIDERATIONS_DESC: Deleting your data may affect access to previously contracted services or ongoing bookings. Some data may be retained for legal or compliance reasons, as required by applicable laws.
DATA_DELETION.CONSIDERATIONS_ACCESS: Deleting your data may affect access to previously contracted services or ongoing bookings.
DATA_DELETION.CONSIDERATIONS_RETENTION: Some data may be retained for legal or compliance reasons, as required by applicable laws.
DATA_DELETION.CONTACT: If you have any questions about the data deletion process, feel free to contact us at chevalierbarbershop13@gmail.com.

FACEBOOK.CHEVALIER_INFO: Chevalier barbershop offers the best hairdressing and personal care services.
